thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PLUS Delmere Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient, Clean and Value For Money
thread.title_full: Convenient, Clean and Value For Money - Review of BEST WESTERN PLUS Delmere Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: qiu1989
title: Convenient, Clean and Value For Money
text:
I was given the corner room which was bigger than i expected. I was able to open up 2 luggage on the floor. The room was clean and modernly designed. Although the toilet/shower area was rather small, it was clean and nice.
The hotel was convenient with a number of shops and restaurant nearby. It was just a 5 mins walk to Paddington Station.The staff were friendly as well. Great for travelers who require basic and fuss free accommodation.
